archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.1.11: The use of external suppliers should be identified and recorded in one or more registers, which include operational details (e.g. name, owner and unique description) together with:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
